element.name: process_windows
element.long_description: Name of the script/binary/process to be executed by up.time

element.name: USERNAME
element.long_description: A user on the remote machine with access to read WMI, usually a local administrator.

element.name: PASSWORD
element.long_description: Password for the user we're using to gather the WMI metric.

element.name: authenticate
element.long_description: If this is a remote machine, credentials will be required to access WMI.

element.name: SMTPRecvAveragebytesPermessage
element.short_description: SMTP Receive Average Bytes Per Message
element.long_description: SMTP Send Average Bytes Per Message in the returned data

element.name: SMTPRecvBytesReceivedPersec
element.short_description: SMTP Received Bytes Received Per Second
element.long_description: SMTP Received Bytes Per Second in the returned data

element.name: SMTPRecvConnectionsCurrent
element.long_description: Total Receive SMTP Connections on the server

element.name: SMTPRecvMessagesReceivedPersec
element.short_description: SMTP Inbound Messages Received Per Second
element.long_description: SMTP Inbound Messages Received Per Second in the returned data

element.name: SMTPSendBytesSentPersec
element.long_description: SMTP Bytes Sent Per Second in the returned data

element.name: SMTPSendConnectionsCurrent
element.long_description: SMTP Outbound Connections in the returned data

element.name: SMTPSendMessagesSentPersec
element.long_description: SMTP Messages Sent Per Second in the returned data

element.name: OWACurrentUsers
element.long_description: Current Webmail Users in the returned data

element.name: OWALogonsPersec
element.long_description: Webmail User Logons Per Second in the returned data

element.name: RPCAveragedLatency
element.long_description: RPC Averaged Latency in the returned data

element.name: RPCClientsBytesRead
element.long_description: RPC Clients Bytes Read in the returned data

element.name: RPCClientsBytesWritten
element.long_description: RPC Clients Bytes Written in the returned data

element.name: RPCdispatchtaskactivethreads
element.long_description: RPC Dispatch Task Active Threads in the returned data

element.name: RPCdispatchtaskqueuelength
element.long_description: RPC Dispatch Task Queue Length in the returned data

element.name: RPCOperationsPersec
element.long_description: RPC Operations Per sec in the returned data

element.name: RPCRequests
element.long_description: RPC Requests in the returned data

element.name: ApA_AverageEventProcessingTimeInSeconds
element.short_description: Average Event Processing Time In Seconds Per Assistant
element.long_description: Average Event Processing Time In Seconds Per Assistant in the returned data

element.name: ApA_AverageEventQueueTimeInSeconds
element.short_description: Average Event Queue Time In Seconds Per Assistant
element.long_description: Average Event Queue Time In Seconds Per Assistant in the returned data

element.name: ApA_EventsinQueue
element.long_description: Events In Queue Per Assistant in the returned data

element.name: ApA_EventsProcessed
element.long_description: Events Processed Per Assistant in the returned data

element.name: ApA_EventsProcessedPersec
element.short_description: Events Processed Per Second Per Assistant
element.long_description: Events Processed Per Second Per Assistant in the returned data

element.name: ApDB_AverageEventProcessingTimeInseconds
element.short_description: Average Event Processing Time In Seconds Per Database
element.long_description: Average Event Processing Time In Seconds Per Database in the returned data

element.name: ApDB_AverageMailboxProcessingTimeInseconds
element.short_description: Average Mailbox Processing Time In Seconds Per Database
element.long_description: Average Mailbox Processing Time In Seconds Per Database in the returned data

element.name: ApDB_Eventsinqueue
element.long_description: Events In Queue Per Database in the returned data

element.name: ApDB_MailboxesProcessed
element.long_description: Mailboxes Processed Per Database in the returned data

element.name: ApDB_MailboxesprocessedPersec
element.short_description: Mailboxes Processed Per Second Per Database
element.long_description: Mailboxes Processed Per Second Per Database in the returned data

element.name: timer
element.long_description: Response time in ms
